hero.title: The Biggest AI Hub in the World
hero.description: AchAI is your go-to destination for AI tools, materials, and projects.

mission.title: Democratizing AI for Everyone
mission.description1: At AchAI, we're committed to democratizing AI technology and making it accessible to everyone. We believe in the transformative power of artificial intelligence and its potential to solve real-world problems.
mission.description2: Our platform connects you with the best AI solutions and resources to help you harness this power, regardless of your technical expertise. We're building a future where AI is a tool that empowers everyone, not just those with specialized knowledge.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.quote: We envision a world where artificial intelligence is accessible to everyone, empowering individuals and organizations to solve complex problems and unlock new possibilities.

values.title: What Drives Us
values.description: These core principles guide our decisions and shape our platform.

info.title: What are MCP Categories?
info.description1: Model Context Protocol (MCP) resources are organized into categories based on their primary function and the type of data or services they connect to. This organization helps you find the right MCP resources for your specific AI use case.
info.description2: Each category contains specialized tools that extend Claude's capabilities in different ways. You can browse by high-level category (Servers, Clients, Agents) or explore specific subcategories to find exactly what you need for your project.
info.description3: MCP provides secure access to external data sources and tools

relevance_ai.name: Relevance AI
relevance_ai.description: Build your AI Workforce: The home for AI teams that work for you
features: AI Agents - Build and recruit AI agents to automate tasks and workflows
AI Tools - Create custom AI tools that integrate with your tech stack
Multi-Agent Systems - Develop collaborative AI teams to solve complex problems
Comprehensive API - Integrate seamlessly into your existing systems
No-Code Builder - Create and deploy AI agents with a user-friendly interface

customgpt.name: CustomGPT.ai
customgpt.tagline: Transform Your Content Into Intelligent Chatbots
customgpt.description: Build powerful AI chatbots that deliver exceptional customer experiences using your own business content
features: Intuitive Builder - Create custom AI chatbots in minutes with no coding required
Versatile Integration - Connect with 100+ data sources including Google Drive, Notion, and Shopify
Advanced Content Processing - Support for 1,400+ document formats with text extraction from images
AI Accuracy Engine - Proprietary anti-hallucination technology ensures factual, reliable responses
Multilingual Capabilities - Support customers globally with 95+ language options
Conversation Analytics - Gain insights from user interactions to continuously improve performance

aistudios.name: AI Studios
aistudios.tagline: Bring Your Content To Life With AI Videos
aistudios.description: Create lifelike AI avatars and videos for marketing, training, and customer engagement
features: Lifelike AI Avatars - Choose from 100+ realistic AI presenters for your videos
Multi-Language Support - Create videos in 140+ languages with native-sounding speech
Text-to-Video Conversion - Simply paste your script to generate professional videos
Custom Avatar Creation - Create your own AI avatar from photos or video clips
Background Customization - Use custom backgrounds or choose from premium templates
Advanced Editing Tools - Fine-tune expressions, gestures, and delivery for perfect results

rytr.name: Rytr
rytr.description: AI writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content in just seconds, at a fraction of the cost
features: Smart Editor - Real-time suggestions, tone adjustments, and content variations
Template Library - 40+ templates for blogs, emails, ads, product descriptions, and more
30+ Languages - Generate and translate content to reach global audiences
Plagiarism-Free Content - Original, fresh content for every generation
SEO Optimization - Create content that ranks well on search engines
Team Collaboration - Share templates and content with your team

mcp_client.title: MCP Client Guide
mcp_client.what_clients_do_description: MCP clients allow AI models like Claude to access external data and tools through the Model Context Protocol. They provide a standardized interface between the AI and various data sources, tools, and systems.
mcp_client.enhanced_ai_capabilities_description: Enables AI to interact with various tools and data sources securely
mcp_client.security_control_description: Manages permissions and access to sensitive information
mcp_client.standardized_integration_description: Works with any MCP-compatible server for expanded functionality
mcp_client.developer_experience_description: Streamlines building AI-powered applications with external capabilities
mcp_client.installation_description: Visit the GitHub repository for detailed installation instructions.
mcp_client.basic_usage_description: Here's how to get started with {{name}}:
mcp_client.compatible_servers_description: {{name}} works with these popular MCP servers:

mcp_server.title: MCP Server Integration Guide
mcp_server.replace_parameters: Replace parameters as needed based on the documentation.
mcp_server.security_intro: When using MCP servers, be mindful of these security best practices:
mcp_server.verify_source: Verify the source of your MCP servers before using them
mcp_server.check_permissions: Check the permissions granted to the server carefully
mcp_server.sensitive_data: For sensitive data, consider using self-hosted servers
mcp_server.keep_updated: Keep your MCP server implementations updated to the latest version
mcp_server.environment_isolation: This server is written in {language}, ensure your environment has proper isolation
mcp_server.resources_description: Provides structured data that Claude can reference and analyze
mcp_server.resources_server_description: This server provides file contents as readable resources
mcp_server.tools_description: Functions that Claude can invoke through the server for specific tasks
mcp_server.tools_server_description: Provides tools for reading, writing, and managing files securely
mcp_server.prompts_description: Pre-configured instructions that guide model behavior for specific tasks
mcp_server.prompts_server_description: Includes optimized prompts for common operations with this server type
mcp_server.security_description: Controls and permissions that help maintain data privacy and security
mcp_server.security_server_description: Implements MCP permission protocols to protect sensitive data

ai_agent.title: AI Agent Framework
ai_agent.agent_description: {{name}} is an AI agent framework that enables the creation of autonomous, task-specific agents powered by large language models. These agents can collaborate, use tools, access external data, and perform complex tasks through well-designed workflows.
ai_agent.tool_integration_description: Access external APIs, databases, and services
ai_agent.tool_integration_detail: Streamlined access to external services through standardized interfaces
ai_agent.multi_agent_description: Specialized agents working together on complex tasks
ai_agent.multi_agent_detail: Coordinated agent interactions for complex task completion
ai_agent.memory_detail: Sophisticated memory systems for long-running agent processes
ai_agent.workflow_detail: Structured task execution paths for predictable agent behavior
ai_agent.why_use_description: {{name}} provides a powerful framework for creating AI agents that can work independently or collaborate to solve complex tasks. Its flexible architecture allows for customization to specific use cases while maintaining high performance and reliability.
ai_agent.research_description: Conduct complex research tasks, analyze data, and generate comprehensive reports
ai_agent.content_description: Generate, edit, and optimize various types of content with specialized agents
ai_agent.task_automation_description: Automate complex workflows across multiple systems and data sources
ai_agent.software_description: Assist with coding, debugging, testing, and documentation tasks
ai_agent.support_description: Handle complex customer inquiries with access to knowledge bases and tools
ai_agent.data_description: Extract, transform, and analyze data from multiple sources
ai_agent.installation_description: Visit the GitHub repository for detailed installation instructions.
ai_agent.sample_code_description: Basic example of using {{name}} with Claude.
